title: Can anyone ID this old poster style typeface?
content:
Any ideas? It is really nice and classic

[http://www.lovelyinternet.co.uk/images/blog\_images/yrbookpitch4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011606/http:/www.lovelyinternet.co.uk/images/blog_images/yrbookpitch4.jpg "http://www.lovelyinternet.co.uk/images/blog\_images/yrbookpitch4.jpg")

 [‹ Woody Allen type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011606/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45966 "Go to previous forum topic") [Funky Reggae Font! PLEASE HELP! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011606/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45963 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j. cullen

comments.content: Thanks again, I have Railroad Gothic and it seems to be the one...cheers
